import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { fetchTrumpTweets, fetchHillaryTweets, resetView } from '../redux/actions/tweetAction' import { Container, Row, Card, Button, Jumbotron } from 'react-bootstrap' import React from 'react'; export default function Home() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const tweeter = useSelector(state => state); return (

Welcome To The Tweet Fetcher

{tweeter.tweeter.info}
 {tweeter.tweeter.selected && tweeter.tweeter.tweets.map(function(tweet, index){ return( Tweet #{ index + 1 } { tweet } {tweeter.tweeter.dates[index]} ); })} ) }
